Summary: spotted a pill shaped , metal , silver mercury object stationary in sky on my home for lunch ,
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Moncton
There were no other sightings in Moncton on or around February 18th 1996
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way home for lunch from work,I didn,t spot the object in the sky at 1st . as I turn left onto Berrymills road, I puzzled for a moment ,as there where 6 cars parked off to side of the road, with the occupances standing outside of their vechicals ,looking into the sky ? where my attention was drawn to the same part of the sky , where a silver color Cylinder was hovering motionless in the western part of the sky , it was a clear ,and sunny , it looked like it was about a mile away, its color was like liquid mercury , found inside the old thermostats, I slowed down, to try to get a better look , and try managing to keep the Car steady , I slowed down, trying examed , this object , I couldn't, make out any fine details it almost seemed to be slowly rotating ,as it was hovering , I tried figure out what I was looking at, this was no jet or airplane , thought it may have been a balloon ,but we have all seen how they wobble and slowly rise up, this was dead still in position . there were other car behind me , as I approach my right turn on to the Horseman road, I started I losing sight of it thru the tree line, I drove to the other end of the Horseman road , where it was open view of the same sky section and looked for the Object again ,,,,But it was gone, this was in 1996 and Digital Cameras were not as common as today , no proof to certify what was seen. I only hope the persons who where parked long Berrymills Road, Happen read this piece and can provide more details of that Object, seen that day in Jan to April of 1996
